page.title: 04YOUTH CLUBS IN CUMNOCK
page.content:
At one Youth Club I go to, there are videos, Ataris, computer games, 3 pool tables, television, dart boards and a tuck shop.
When we go in we start the night with putting your name on the list to play pool then we go through to the lounge to pay the admission fees then we learn either to make things like windmills out of lolly sticks or go through to a bigger room where table tennis or swingball is or listen to records. The Youth Club starts at 7 pm and finishes at 9.30 pm . Some of the trips we go on are quite cheap. We only have to pay 20p to a Â£1. So far we have gone to Ayr Baths, Edinburgh, Butlin's Holiday Camp and Liverpool.
